channel.title: Read-It-Later on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Read-It-Later on Arrans github.io

item.title: karakeep-app/karakeep
item.description: A self-hostable bookmark-everything app (links, notes and images) with AI-based automatic tagging and full text search

item.title: linkwarden/linkwarden
item.description: ⚡️⚡️⚡️ Self-hosted collaborative bookmark manager to collect, read, annotate, and fully preserve what matters, all in one place.

item.title: wallabag/wallabag
item.description: wallabag is a self hostable application for saving web pages: Save and classify articles. Read them later. Freely.

item.title: omnivore-app/omnivore
item.description: Omnivore is a complete, open source read-it-later solution for people who like reading.
